cardContent.initHelperText: Here is your profile information, which contains your teaching locations and introduction statement.

cardContent.helperText: You can edit your profile image by uploading it here.

Please enter your profile video.
Please make sure that you're entering the link only! e.g. '<iframe width="560"; height="315"; src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/PlDN8yB16bY"; frameborder="0"; allow="autoplay; encrypted-media" allowfullscreen></iframe>'

You can get your link on YouTube by steps:
  1. Go to the video page
  2. Click "share"(normally below the video). This should take you to a pop-up
  3. In the pop-up, click "embed". This will take you to another pop-up
  4. In the embed video pop-up, copy the text right below the embed video title
You can add, edit or delete your teaching location details here. And you can have at most 4 location details in total.
You can edit introduction statement about yourself here.
